main.heading: CPS Test (Clicks per Second)
main.desc: This simple and free CPS (Clicks per Second) tester will help you quickly determine your mouse click rate.
main.start: CLICK HERE TO START THE KPS TEST

howToStart.heading: How do I start the CPS Test?

item1.heading: Just click in the test area
item1.desc: To get started, just click in the testing area and the test will start immediately. You can use full screen mode and light/dark mode to make testing as convenient as possible for you.

item2.heading: Maximize click-through rates
item2.desc: After running the test, try to make as many clicks as possible in the allotted time. We have different timeframes from 1 second to 10 seconds.

item3.heading: See the result
item3.desc: After taking the test, you will know your score and your average click through rate (CPS).
